{"id":1051401783,"question_id":3093,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"9Â months","timestamp":1694918169,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"3 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1051401783/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Sum of Values at Indices With K Set Bits","memory":"44.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int sumIndicesWithKSetBits(List<Integer> nums, int k) {\n        int res = 0;\n        \n        for(int i=0;i<nums.size(); i++){\n            \n            if(getBit(i)==k)\n                res+=nums.get(i);\n        }\n        \n        return res;\n        \n    }\n    \n    private int getBit(int n){\n        int cnt=0;\n        \n        String s = Integer.toBinaryString(n);\n        for(char ch : s.toCharArray()){\n            if(ch=='1')\n                cnt++;\n        }\n        \n        return cnt;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"sum-of-values-at-indices-with-k-set-bits","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
